notes: Fix a broken 'find out more' link
The quick access panel lets you quickly switch between tabs and groups without having to enter groups view; can be disabled in the add-on's preferences as usual (issue #5)

Single view mode; the current group is shown stretched across the whole window, maximizing the space where to show its tabs; you can switch groups from their thumbnails at the top of the window (issue #46)
Display groups automatically in a grid layout; you can switch between this, single view, and the classic free arrange mode through the controller buttons on the right (issue #13)
Separate pinned tabs area, under the main controllers on the right; arrange pinned tabs by dragging them into, out of, and within this area (issue #34)
You can now open and go to a new tab in any group by clicking its "Open new tab" button
Show loading indicator instead of the favicon while in groups view if a tab isn't finished yet
Mute control and sound playing indicator in groups view for each tab with active audio
When a group has too many tabs, it can be scrolled instead of stacked (issue #56)
Ability to hide tab thumbnails in each group (issue #56)
Show the number of tabs at the top of each group; can be disabled in preferences (issue #175)
Use regular expressions to automatically catch tabs into specific groups (issue #130)
Tabs context menu now works while in groups view
Show the active group's name in the toolbar button (issue #72)
If you use Tab Mix Plus to style unread and unloaded tabs, the same styling will be applied to those tabs in groups view as well
Option to discard empty groups when closing their last tab; enabled by default to mimic the previous behavior
Can restore tabs and groups from several backups created automatically by Session Manager, Tab Mix Plus, and Firefox itself
cs, es, ja-JP, ja-JP-mac, pl and sl locales
Significant improvement to memory usage, as well as to browser startup time and when opening new tabs (issue #47)
Simplified and modernized a lot of the code
Rewrote drag and resize code, should be more responsive in some cases but a little jumpy in others; this was a necessary change for implentating many of the other features
Tons of performance and stability improvements

When dragging/resizing a group, it only snaps to the edges of other groups after releasing the mouse button (rather than while still dragging or resizing), but those snap-to areas are more visible now
Single-click in the empty area of a group to make it the active group, double-click to zoom into its active tab; you can still single click any individual tab to bring it up immediately
Switching through groups using the keyboard shortcut sorts them by the order they are shown in single view or grid layout, instead of as alphabetically by their title or of their active tab as before
Rewrote and redesigned the search interface in groups view, to make it more usable and accessible
The tab thumbnails should now better represent the page contents, and their aspect ratio should also more closely reflect the window's dimensions

Improved memory consumption while not in groups view, by discarding (in the background) tab thumbnails while they're not needed; they will be redone as necessary when re-entering groups view (special thanks to the8472) (issue #185)
New icons and buttons all around groups view, better suited for HiDPI screens (zoom factor) and touchscreens (issue #24) (issue #50) (issue #92)
Many other significant visual changes to the groups view interface
When closing the last visible tab, it will open a new tab instead of directly taking you to groups view; only when you close this new tab it will take you to groups view as before (issue #88)
(Mac OSX) default keyboard shortcuts for switching groups now use Control instead of Command, as to not conflict with the same shortcuts in the operating system (issue #102)
When restoring from a backup, the groups and tabs list adapts its height in smaller windows to more easily access the final Import button
To avoid confusion, the "Show my windows and tabs from last time when Firefox starts" button in the add-on's preferences will be hidden when it's not needed, instead of just being disabled
Unhide preference to discard warnings about session not being saved
Compatibility with Firefox 44 and below, compatibility with Firefox 45 will be maintained for the duration of the ESR 45 life cycle
Zoom animation when entering and leaving groups view, it wasn't particularly nice, it didn't work with the new interface anymore, and it had a few problems anyway
Groups search no longer lists tabs from other windows, that didn't work very well anyway
Default file name when backing up groups or exporting preferences would have the wrong month (issue #49)
Constant CPU usage when updating the add-on because of an infinite loop

(Windows) taskbar previews would show all tabs rather than only those in the current group, leading to very inconsistent behavior of turning previews on and off depending on the number of tabs open (issue #62)
Sometimes clicking the (actual) close button of the Undo Close Group button would bring back the group instead of closing it (issue #63)
Switch to next/previous group keyboard shortcuts wouldn't work if there were any empty groups (issue #75)
(OSX and Linux) backing up the groups and exporting the add-on's preferences would create files without the ".json" extension that the add-on couldn't immediately recognize afterwards (issue #110)
(non-e10s) some missing functionality right after updating the add-on until the browser was restarted
After navigating away from the preferences tab, navigating back (through the back button) wouldn't work (issue #138)
Compatibility with Session Manager, it shouldn't show a warning about groups not being saved when Session Manager is set to prompt to restore a session at startup (issue #141)
Don't show warning about groups not being saved when prompting at shutdown (issue #152)
Updating the add-on while in groups view could leave an empty window with no access to either groups or tabs
Shortcuts and context menus for editing text (cut, copy, paste, etc) wouldn't work anywhere in groups view
(Firefox 47) could fail to detect customize mode during startup
Memory leaks when dealing with chrome tabs (thanks to the8472) (issue #194)
Small memory leak when disabling/updating the add-on (thanks to the8472) (issue #195)
Many visual compatibility tweaks for FT DeepDark and other dark themes, it may not be perfect but it should look much better now (issue #86)
Closing the last tab in a group shouldn't load another group's tab unnecessarily (issue #106)
Compatibility with Speed Dial [FVD]: opening new tabs while in groups view wouldn't open Speed Dial's page when it should (issue #187)
Compatibility with Keybinder and Dorando keyconfig: it wouldn't properly recognize keys disabled through those add-ons (thus available) on startup
Compatibility with AdBlock Plus, default shortcut to toggle groups view could not work (issue #159)

Added a small section to this page to promote my new web series "A dude and his Firefox"; it will be completely out of your way unless you point at the icon at the bottom corner, and you can dismiss it completely by clicking its close button.
Lots of other fixes and improvements
Can use the control key in Mac OSX in the customizable keyboard shortcuts (issue #39)

Hidden preference "extensions.tabgroups.noWarningAboutSession", to never show warnings about tabs and groups not being saved after closing the window; enable with caution as it's very easy to forget they won't be saved
Added de, fy-NL, nl, zh-CN and zh-TW locales
When switching groups through the keyboard shortcuts, and in the "Move to Group" item in the tabs context menu, groups are now ordered by their title (issue #40)
In HiDPI configurations in linux, the Tab Groups button wouldn't have an icon (issue #28)
The notice that groups and tabs can't be saved in private windows should only be shown once per window
Compatibility with Tab Mix Plus's session manager (version 0.4.2.1 or later only) (issue #37)
While in groups mode you shouldn't be able to make any kind of text selections outside of group name fields or the search field (issue #38)
Can customize keyboard shortcuts for switching groups (issue #3)

For users that install the add-on only after updating to Firefox 45, there will be a Load Migration Backup button in the Backup / Restore pane that loads directly the session backup file created by the migration, for ease of use
Added support for the following keys in the keyboard shortcuts: ` ´ ~ ^
In private windows, Tab Groups mode will show a small notice at the bottom for a few seconds reminding you your groups and tabs won't be persisted after closing the window
Added ability to dismiss the warning at the bottom when it will not persist groups and tabs after closing the current (non-private) window (issue #16)
Can open the browser console (Ctrl+Shift+J) from within TabView
Ensure UTF-8 character encoding throughout the code (issue #10)
Small code cleanup - trim trailing whitespaces (issue #15)
"groups" attribute in toolbar button wouldn't exist when first starting up Firefox
"Move to group" shouldn't be visible in the context menu for pinned tabs
Sometimes thumbnails for tabs with videos wouldn't update properly (credit to the8472, who wound up being uncredited in the changelog due to a fault of mine) (issue #14)
Tab thumbnails should be stored, so that when you next open the browser window, they're still there while the tab is still unloaded (issue #17)
Sometimes toggling the ctrl/alt/shift boxes in a keyboard shortcut wouldn't correctly reflect if the selected key was actually available
Compatibility with Bug 566510 - Allow multiselect operations on tabs (issue #7)
Show a grabbing cursor when dragging tabs and groups (issue #19)
Couldn't use editing shortcuts Ctrl+LeftArrow/RightArrow/Backspace/Delete while editing a group title or typing in the search box (issue #20)
After closing the current active tab while in groups mode, many keyboard shortcuts would be unusable, such as hitting Esc to leave groups mode

Closing the currently active tab while in groups mode should make active the immediately previous tab, or the tab that should be selected as defined by your custom preferences (i.e. Tab Mix Plus's settings)
Many tab related keyboard shortcuts, such as Ctrl+Shift+T to undo closing a tab, wouldn't work while in groups mode
Tabs should not always be placed at the end of the group when reopening a closed tab while in groups mode
